H0.text: which church was given a letter in the book of revelation. Ephesus

H1.text: which church was given a letter in the book of revelation. Smyrna

H2.text: which church was given a letter in the book of revelation. Pergamos

H3.text: which church was given a letter in the book of revelation. Sardis

A4.text: Ephesus (Revelation 2:1–7): known for having laboured hard and not fainted, and separating themselves from the wicked; admonished for having forsaken its first love (2:4)

A5.text: Smyrna (Revelation 2:8–11): admired for its tribulation and poverty; but for which it is foretold that it will suffer persecution (2:10)

A6.text: Ephesus was one of the seven cities addressed in the Book of Revelation
